parameters.name: Br
parameters.description: Radial component of the magnetic field, positive in the direction of Sun to spacecraft.

parameters.name: Bt
parameters.description: Azimuthal component of the magnetic field, positive in the direction of planetary orbital motion.

parameters.name: Bn
parameters.description: North/South component of the magnetic field, positive northward.

parameters.name: Bmag
parameters.description: Magnitude (sqrt of sum of squares) of the field component averages.

parameters.name: Average Bmag
parameters.description: Average of the field magnitude over the averaging interval (nT).

parameters.name: Delta
parameters.description: Spacecraft centered heliographic magnetic field latitude: Delta = asin(Bn/Bmag).

parameters.name: Lambda
parameters.description: Spacecraft centered heliographic magnetic field longitude: Lambda = atan(Bt/Br).

parameters.name: RMS Br
parameters.description: Root-mean-square deviation of Br over the averaging interval.

parameters.name: RMS Bt
parameters.description: Root-mean-square deviation of Bt over the averaging interval.

parameters.name: RMS Bn
parameters.description: Root-mean-square deviation of Bn over the averaging interval.

parameters.name: NPTS
parameters.description: Number of points in the average.
